name: CrowdStrike
description: Integrate with CrowdStrike to list, get, list and more.
author: agenticmail

tools.name: List Detections
tools.description: List CrowdStrike Falcon detections. Returns detection IDs for further detail retrieval. Optionally filter by query.

tools.name: Get Detection
tools.description: Retrieve detailed information about specific CrowdStrike detections by their IDs. Returns behaviors, severity, device info, and status.

tools.name: List Hosts
tools.description: List CrowdStrike Falcon hosts (endpoints). Returns host IDs, hostnames, platforms, and last seen times.

tools.name: Contain Host
tools.description: Contain or lift containment on a CrowdStrike host. Containment isolates the host from the network while maintaining sensor connectivity.

tools.name: Search Iocs
tools.description: Search for Indicators of Compromise (IOCs) in CrowdStrike. Query by type (ip, domain, sha256, etc.) and value.

cloud.label: Cloud Region
cloud.description: CrowdStrike cloud region for API access
